title: Sound Logos Retro Video Games STP
description: Crafted with precision at 24 Bit / 96 kHz, 'Raw' comprises 444 Sounds & Cues, meticulously tailored to fulfill the fundamental audio requirements of classic retro games.
longDescription:
"Embark on an auditory adventure with our innovative approach to sound pack creation. At the core of our process, we explore the harmony between human elements and Sound Props, uniting the soul, mind, heart, ears, and touch. This unique method leads us down a path of distinctive sound production.


Our quest began with the acclaimed 'Sound Toys Percussion Wooden' pack, marking the inception of our journey under the STP (Sound Toys Percussion) banner. After the triumph of three specialized sound packs, we are thrilled to introduce the latest installment in our series: the STP Retro Video Games Series, with its fourth pack, â€˜Sound Logos'.


Crafted with precision at 24 Bit / 96 kHz, 'Raw' comprises 444 Sounds & Cues, meticulously tailored to fulfill the fundamental audio requirements of classic retro games. This pack is not just a set of sounds; it's a gateway to a realm where nostalgia meets innovation, fueling your creative vision for the games of tomorrow."
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 444

Number of Audio Cues: 444

Sample rate / bit rate: 24 Bit / 96 kHz

Do Sound FX loop: Some of them Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 00:35:21

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
